mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, P.POST_TITLE, C.CATEGORY_C_NAME FROM TBL_POST P INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_C C ON P.CATEGORY_C_ID = C.ID ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 16

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_HITS, P.POST_DATE, (P.POST_LIKE_COUNT + P.POST_COMMENT_COUNT) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM TBL_POST P INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID ORDER BY TOTAL_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT FROM TBL_POST P ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, P.POST_TITLE, C.CATEGORY_C_NAME FROM TBL_POST P INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_C C ON P.CATEGORY_C_ID = C.ID ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 16

SELECT P.ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, P.POST_TITLE, C.CATEGORY_C_NAME FROM TBL_POST P INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_C C ON P.CATEGORY_C_ID = C.ID ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, P.POST_TITLE, (P.POST_LIKE_COUNT + P.POST_COMMENT_COUNT) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM TBL_POST P INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID ORDER BY TOTAL_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
